name: Spindle Zoo
tagline: Data and Data Analysis for the Spindle Zoo Paper
body:
### Welcome to the Spindle Zoo.   
    
You have landed on the companion site to the Spindle Zoo project.

Feel free to download the complete repository (data and code) as zip archive or tar ball.   
Below you will find a legend to the files in the repository.   
Please let us know if something is not clear. We will make every attempt to fix it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
